name: HappySoaps Arganolie en rozemarijn body bar
composition:
Ingredients: Sodium Oleate, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Cocoate, Aqua, Glycerin, Parfum, Decyl Glucoside, 
Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leafs, Pentasodium Pentetate, Tetrasodium Etidronate, CI 77891, CI 15510
